DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; CHARITY : MUSIC FANS SWAP FOOD FOR CD DISCOUNTS
DOC.TEXT: Music fans contributed 134 pounds of canned_food for the Los Angeles Regional Foodbank ' s Feed the Hungry While You Feed Your Ears food drive , staged earlier this month at the Moby Disc music store in Santa Monica.The food drive , coordinated with Moby Records , Bam magazine and KROQ-FM , was the first of its kind involving the music industry , organizers said . Music fans who donated one can of food received a $ 1 to $ 5 discount on any CD in the store . The Los Angeles Regional Food_Bank , founded in 1973 , works with 740 local charities throughout Los Angeles County to help feed nearly 300 # 000 people a week .
